skill.name: process-code-review
skill.description: Process code review findings interactively - fix or skip issues from monty-code-review output. Presents issues in severity order, applies fixes, runs quality checks, and updates review documents with status markers.
skill.summary: Process code review findings interactively - fix or skip issues from monty-code-review output. Prese...
skill.author: DiversioTeam

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill with no executable code. Only contains documentation and workflow instructions for processing code review findings. Uses standard AI assistant tools (Read, Edit, Bash, Glob, Grep, TodoWrite) with no network access, no credential handling, and no obfuscated payloads.

content.value_statement: Code review findings can be overwhelming to track and resolve. This skill presents issues in severity order, applies fixes with quality checks, and updates review documents with status markers for complete traceability.
actual_capabilities: Parse review documents with severity-tagged issues (BLOCKING, SHOULD_FIX, NIT)
Present issues one-by-one with options to fix or skip
Apply code fixes using the Edit tool with proposed solutions
Run quality checks (ruff check, ruff format, type checking)
Update review documents with status markers and timestamps
Generate processing summaries with stats on fixed, skipped, and deferred issues
limitations: Requires monty-code-review skill to generate review documents first
Does not commit changes - separate pre-commit skill required
Quality checks depend on project having ruff and type checking configured
Cannot resolve issues without clear proposed fixes in the review document

use_cases.title: Fix code review issues
use_cases.description: Systematically work through code review findings, applying fixes with quality validation

use_cases.title: Track review completion
use_cases.description: Monitor progress on code review fixes with documented status for every issue

use_cases.title: Verify fixes applied
use_cases.description: Process colleague fixes and ensure quality gates pass before merging

prompt_templates.title: Basic review processing
prompt_templates.prompt: Process the wellbeing_service_review.md file and help me fix the issues.

prompt_templates.title: Dry run preview
prompt_templates.prompt: Use process-code-review skill on api_review.md with --dry-run to preview all issues.

prompt_templates.title: Auto-fix minor issues
prompt_templates.prompt: Run process-code-review with --auto --severity=NIT on the review file.

prompt_templates.title: Critical issues focus
prompt_templates.prompt: Use process-code-review --severity=BLOCKING to focus on critical issues first.

best_practices: Run monty-code-review first to generate the review document before using this skill
Use --dry-run flag first to preview all issues before making changes
Process BLOCKING issues first as they must be fixed before merge
Run backend-atomic-commit pre-commit after processing to validate all changes
anti_patterns: Using --auto flag on BLOCKING issues without reviewing the proposed fix
Skipping issues without documenting the reason for future reference
Not running quality checks after applying fixes before moving to the next issue
Marking issues as fixed without actually applying the code changes

faq.question: What tools does this skill work with?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude and Claude Code. It integrates with monty-code-review for generating reviews and backend-atomic-commit for pre-commit checks.

faq.question: What quality checks run after fixes?
faq.answer: The skill runs ruff check --fix, ruff format, and ty check on modified files. Django projects also get manage.py check.

faq.question: Can I preview changes before applying them?
faq.answer: Yes, use the --dry-run flag to preview all issues and proposed fixes without modifying any files.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: This is a prompt-based skill. It only reads review documents and source files you specify. No data leaves your environment.

faq.question: Why are my changes not committing?
faq.answer: This skill does not commit changes. Run backend-atomic-commit pre-commit after processing to run pre-commit checks and commit.

faq.question: How is this different from monty-code-review?
faq.answer: monty-code-review generates the review document. This skill processes that document, applying fixes or skipping issues with tracking.
